description: A delightful drink for the warmer months of the year, it can be prepared early and stored until it's time to drink it. The frozen cranberries in this&nbsp;rum mixture give it an extra burst of sweetness that will have your senses tingling!
name: Apple Cider Punch
recipeIngredient: Orange slices and frozen cranberries for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Mix all ingredients in a punch bowl. Stir well to combine.
recipeInstructions.text: Mix all ingredients in a punch bowl. Stir well to combine.

recipeInstructions.name: Add ice in a clear plastic bag to help the punch get cool without diluting the mixture.
recipeInstructions.text: Add ice in a clear plastic bag to help the punch get cool without diluting the mixture.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with orange slices and frozen cranberries if desired.
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with orange slices and frozen cranberries if desired.
